snippet: Anthony D. Weiner, seeking to deflect attention from the scandal hanging over his run for mayor, put forward a number of policy ideas on Monday, including making police officers on patrol wear miniature cameras.
abstract: Trailside blog; Anthony D Weiner, seeking to deflect attention from the scandal hanging over his run for mayor, puts forward a number of policy ideas, including making police officers on patrol wear miniature cameras.
lead_paragraph: Anthony D. Weiner, seeking to deflect attention from the scandal hanging over his run for mayor, put forward a number of policy ideas on Monday, including making police officers on patrol wear miniature cameras.

headline.main: One Weiner Idea: Cameras for the Police
headline.print_headline:
One Weiner Idea:
Cameras for Police
